product_name: Mountain Hardwear Trekkin Thermal Henley Shirt - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Mountain Hardwear Trekkin Thermal Henley women's shirt is great for kicking around, but when you want to throw it into gear and get hiking, it also performs nicely. Small waffle knit in a comfortable polyester/wool blend wicks moisture, dries quickly and layers well. Flatlock seams maximize motion and minimize abrasion; 5-button placket. The Mountain Hardwear Trekkin Thermal Henley shirt sports a semifitted design; it's not too tight and not too loose. Closeout.
short_description: The Mountain Hardwear Trekkin Thermal Henley women's shirt is great for kicking around, but when you want to throw it into gear and get hiking, it also performs nicely.
